body.p: The country, the software distribution is supplied to, may have restrictions on the import, possession, and/or use of the software. Furthermore, the export or re-export of the software distribution to other countries may be restricted or even prohibited.

This software distribution includes components, which are subject to export/import control. The country, the software distribution is supplied to, may have restrictions on the import, possession, and/or use of the software. Furthermore, the export or re-export of the software distribution to other countries may be restricted or even prohibited.
Before using or re-exporting this distribution check the country specific laws, regulations and policies. For more information, see also .
The following table provides export/import details on specific software component included in this software distribution:

row.entry: The Bouncy Castle artifacts contain cryptographic software and include additional crypto providers. Classification details can be found online: .
Java Simplified Encryption API (Jasypt) uses the Java Cryptography Extension API and as such is classified for export control. See details online: .

The Oracle Java Runtime Environment (Oracle JRE) contains cryptographic software. For more details consult the Oracle Binary Code License agreement on . For further details on the Oracle Global Trade Compliance check .

body.p: This software distribution does not include any component classified as restricted to export/import.
Please note that ${organization.name} does not take any responsibility for the correctness, actuality, and content of the above external links.
